item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>It is actually yes. During the day I am running VMWare Fusion, MyEclipse, Skype, Adium, Firefox and NetNewsWite and it definitely feels more responsive.<br /><br />That being said I am looking forward to next summer when I can upgrade again to the latest and greatest version <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif"</a> /></p>
item.content:encoded:
It is actually yes. During the day I am running VMWare Fusion, MyEclipse, Skype, Adium, Firefox and NetNewsWite and it definitely feels more responsive.

That being said I am looking forward to next summer when I can upgrade again to the latest and greatest version http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif“ />

item.title: By: damien barnard

item.content:encoded: is it snappier? http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GJN/$File/cool.gif“ />

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>@1 - That's cool thanks Simon.<br /><br />@2 - I just run a 17" MBP, but I took the screenshot with Expose activated so it's just showing everything I was running at the time.</p>
item.content:encoded:
@1 – That’s cool thanks Simon.

@2 – I just run a 17″ MBP, but I took the screenshot with Expose activated so it’s just showing everything I was running at the time.

item.title: By: Rob McDonagh
item.dc:creator: Rob McDonagh
item.description: <p>Dude, what screen resolution (and what display) is that? 'cause wow, that's a whole lot of stuff visible at once. </p>
item.content:encoded: Dude, what screen resolution (and what display) is that? ’cause wow, that’s a whole lot of stuff visible at once.

item.title: By: Simes
item.dc:creator: Simes
item.description: <p>You can change the dock from shiny shelf to plainer clearer rectangle, too. Information on how is here:<br />{ <a href="<a rel="nofollow" href="http://www.tuaw.com/2007/10/25/tuaw-tip-get-rid-of-the-leopard-dock-shelf/"" rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.tuaw.com/2007/10/25/tuaw-tip-get-rid-of-the-leopard-dock-shelf/"</a> rel="nofollow" target ="blank">Link</a> }<br /></p>
item.content:encoded:
You can change the dock from shiny shelf to plainer clearer rectangle, too. Information on how is here:
{ http://www.tuaw.com/2007/10/25/tuaw-tip-get-rid-of-the-leopard-dock-shelf/“ rel=”nofollow” target =”blank”>Link }
